review: Well, I was throughly unimpressed by this game. Sure, it was decent for the first 2 hours, but as soon as the refund period experied, which was probably the plan of the developers, it got increasingly boring. I want my money back for this scam.

review: AMAZING GAME, AMAZING GRAPHICS, AMAZING PRICE.

This game is a very Complex game perfect for fans of MMORPG's. It has so many little things that make you want to spend eternity in the world. I would like to see this game have to capabilities for Vitrual Reality in the future. That would make this game 111/10 Pros:A lot of amazing featuresMassive Worlda lot of varietyCan FlyCons: Takes a while to get the combat mechanics downCan get lost easily
